-   The Encyclopedia of Volcanoes. Elsevier. 2015. [*Link*](https://www.sciencedirect.com/book/9780123859389/the-encyclopedia-of-volcanoes).
-   Assessing Volcanic Hazard: A Review. Oxford Handbooks. 2017. [Link](https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/11157_2016_46).
-   Observing the Volcano World. Springer 2018. [*Link*](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-319-44097-2).
-   If I Understand, I Am Understood: Experiences of Volcanic Risk Communication in Colombia. [Link](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-319-44097-2).

[Link](https://www.oxfordhandbooks.com/view/10.1093/oxfordhb/9780190699420.001.0001/oxfordhb-9780190699420-e-32).

-   “There’s no Plastic in Our Volcano”: A Story About Losing and Finding a Path to Participatory Volcanic Risk Management in Colombia. 2017. [Link](https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/11157_2017_16).
-   Worlding resilience in the Doña Juana Volcano-Páramo, Northern Andes (Colombia): A transdisciplinary view. 2021. Natural Hazards. [Link](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11069-021-04662-4).
-   Volcanic evolution through geomorphological mapping: A case study of Cerro Bravo volcano (Colombia). 2023, Journal of South American Earth Sciences. [Link](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jsames.2023.104472)

-   Implicaciones del Enfoque Metodológico de Evaluación de la Amenaza y el Riesgo de Desastres por Erupciones del Volcán Galeras, Colombia. 2024. REDER. [*Link*](https://www.revistareder.com/ojs/index.php/reder/article/view/137)
